name: A Prayer for the Winter Gears -- DEMO
name_original: A Prayer for the Winter Gears -- DEMO
description:
❄️ After the war but before the healing was a Doll with a promise held close to her heart... ❄️

There once was a girl, who waited patiently for a confession in a town with no past.

There once was a boy, whose pleading eyes hid a terrible secret.

In an alley where nobody entered, in a church everyone forgot, the two found themselves tied by a few simple words from long ago. Forgotten promises, dark confessions, and a string of murders all intertwine a tearful mystery set in the snowy shadows of night.


  This is currently the jam build, so there are only the first four days. Please check back soon so you can get all the endings, extras, and drama! Your save can carry over to the full release.

.+❄️+❄️+❄️+.

Story and Art: kalechips

Programming: Sandalphon

OST: Faefield

Sound Effects: Lankku

.+❄️+❄️+❄️+.

  This game contains mentions of war, death, abuse and violence to some degree, so be warned. There is also some light language. Nothing explicit, though.

 I really like to read comments, so feel free to leave your thoughts. Thank you very much for playing. It's greatly appreciated.
